p.s: On November first, 2021 the British Prime Minister Boris Johnson delivered a speech at the COP26 World Leaders' Summit Opening Ceremony concerning the urgent topic of climate change and the need to act now.
He presents climate change as an urgent problem by comparing it to a doomsday device from a James Bond movie.
The whole world and especially the COP26 has to stop it, starting now.
To do so he explains, all those present have to work together and with the market to move to green technology that already exists.
Furthermore he mentions of they wontwon't act now, future generations now wontwon't be able to forgive them for hesitating.
In the end he states that this summit has to be the beginning of really acting against climate change and the end of empty promises.
Even though it will be hard he says he believes we can do it.
